item.title: Pentagon chief says ready to 'fight and win' against China, urges Asian allies to boost defense spending
item.description: While playing up the U.S.'s enduring commitment to the Indo-Pacific region, Hegseth took swipes at the absence of China's defense minister Dong Jun.

item.title: France's Macron calls on Europe and Asia to unite as U.S.-China tensions flare
item.description: Macron's speech comes amid a regional tour that has also taken him to Vietnam and Indonesia.

item.title: PBS sues Trump over executive order to cut funding
item.description: PBS sued President Donald Trump to block his effort to cut off federal funding for the public broadcaster.

item.title: Elon Musk deflects question about report of drug use, family drama as Trump looks on
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk appeared with President Donald Trump in the Oval Office for an event marking the DOGE founder's departure from Washington.

item.title: Trump lauds Elon Musk and DOGE at White House farewell
item.description: Musk, the Tesla and SpaceX CEO, worked for Trump's DOGE effort after spending over $250 million helping to get him elected.
